name: Murder 21
description: This is an Augmented Reality game that places a grave plot in your living room, yard, park etc. Time is allotted each level to match the strewn-about bones of the restless resident. But don't worry a "murder" of crows are here to assist. Help bring order back to the graves of the departed and unlock "Graveyard Builder", a self controlled portion of the game where you can create your own graveyard in your space using the assets from the game and some previously unseen bonus items as well.
